# Request for Standing Offer: Vocational Training – Chainsaw Safety Training – Non-PSIB

## Details of the Solicitation:

* Record Number: 21C50-22-4069431-A
* Closing Date and Time: 2023-06-01T14:00:00
* Amendment Number: 3
* Amendment Date: 2023-05-09

## Brief Description:

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) seeks a qualified vendor to provide third-party certification for Chainsaw Safety Training to groups of offenders at various federal institutions and Community Industries in the Prairie Region.

## Objective:

To provide third-party Industry standard certification for graduated levels of Chainsaw Safety Training courses, on an as-and-when-requested basis, to groups of offenders at various federal institutions in the Prairie Region.

## Requirements:

* Certify participants at various levels of Chainsaw Safety Training (Basic, Awareness, Intermediate)
* Provide certified instructor(s) to deliver training that meets curriculum requirements
* Deliver training programs that incorporate both classroom and practical sessions
* Provide necessary materials, equipment, and Personal Protective Equipment (PPE)
* Award training certifications to participants upon successful completion of courses

## Estimated Quantity and Duration:

* Estimated quantity of commodity: see solicitation document statement of work and basis of payment
* Standing Offer duration: VPete parenthetical delegated Ending April 30, 2024, with the option to renew for two (2) additional one-year periods.

## Contact Information:

* Contracting Authority: Aimée Legault
* Contact Phone Number: (343) 597-2485

* Competitive procurement strategy: lowest priced compliant bid.
